text: Te, kotoryye ne uverovali, otvergali Nashi yavnyye znameniya, otritsali istinu Nashikh prorokov, budut vechno goret' v ogne, kotoryy budet zhech' ikh kozhu, i kazhdyy raz, kogda ikh kozha poteryayet chuvstvitel'nost' k muke, My zamenim yeyo drugoy kozhey, chtoby oni prodolzhali zhit', ispytyvaya nepreryvnyye bol' i mucheniya, i spolna vkusili nakazaniye. Poistine, Allakh Vsevyshniy mudr v Svoikh delakh! On nakazyvayet togo, kto ne uveroval v Nego, otverg Yego Istinu i nastaival na etom do samoy smerti
